patthana23.17:1.1_0: Nakusalo napaccuppanno dhammo kusalassa paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.17:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.17:4.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.17:5.1_0: Nakusalaṁ napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
